title: New champion/rework compromise
body: Could we finally have a system, where new champions/reworks are disabled in Ranked for like 1-2 weeks, but at the same time during that time period you can't ban that champion in normals? People shouldn't be picking new champions/reworks in Ranked at day 1 and forcing players to use up a ban for such reason, but at the same time people are abusing their bans on normals, so it's even less likely you can practice with that champion.

when does someone "know" a champ?

When you are consitant with that champ and can carry games with it. Typically you know the builds to use, you know the matchups, you know how to play the champ.....it takes many games, which is why you should practice in normal or even Flex before playing solo Q with them.

I like the Idea since it forces people to learn how to play against that specific champion & gives players a chance to try them out. 

However I see a few downsides where teammates might bicker amongst themselves over who gets to play the Champion in question, also might see more frequent dodges as well. 
There's yet another fact that this won't stop players from First-timing the champion in ranked either.

also, just curious, if i've never played lissandra before but i now pick her in ranked how does your system do anything worthwhile?

People have the tendency to pick new champions in Ranked, champions which most of the playerbase haven't even figured out yet; nobody really knows how to build or play with them, their strengths and weaknesses, and the problem is that your teammates don't know either how to prepare. Those other issues you mentioned are indeed problematic, but nothing can be done about that. And besides people already played a lot with feeding Katarina mains to figure out what needs to be done in such situations.
